title: User block feature
description: Users can be blocked after X failed attempts if they cannot provide their credentials properly. Only administrators can unblock them. There is a task in the GMS backlog on GitHub to implement a feature to let the users request unlock their account.

title: What's new in January 2024
description: The development of the Give My Secret continues in 2024! The first new feature is this system announcement board where you can check the recent changes of the application in the future.
